Key Match Events: India posts a massive total of 221/9 after Bangladesh skipper Najmul Hossain Shanto won the toss and put India into bat first on a slightly two-paced wicket which got better as evening went on
India wins the series with a game remaining as Bangladesh could only manage 135/9 in response
Nitish Kumar Reddy scored 74 for India in the first innings
Bangladesh lost seven wickets in the second innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in New Delhi
